feecalculator

Class FeeCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • feecalculator.FeeCalculator

  • public class FeeCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    FeeCalculator class has many methods which would accept parameters like semester ,prerequisites and GPA values to calculate fees and scholarships of a student.

      Semester 1 : $456.48
      Student insurance for the first semester.
      static double INSURENCE_FEE_SEMESTER_II
      Semester 2 (including semester 3) : $760.2
      Student insurance for both second semester and third semester is $760.20.
      static double INSURENCE_FEE_SEMESTER_III
      Semester 3 : $ 0.0
      Student insurance for semester 3 is already included in semester 2.

      This scholarship is only for the first semester.
      static double INTL_STUDENT_SERVICE_FEE
      International student service fee : $75
      International student service fee is the fee charged towards every semester for international students.
      static double ORIENTATION_FEE
      Orientation Fee : $75
      Orientation fee is charged only when a new student attends Northwest and will be applied only to the first-semester fee

      • GRADUATE_WAIVER_PERCENT

        public static final double GRADUATE_WAIVER_PERCENT
        Graduate Non-Resident Waiver 50% of incidental tuition (for all the courses in that semester).
        International students achieve this scholarship only in their 2nd , 3rd and 4th semester if their GPA is greater than or equal to 3.33.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INSURENCE_FEE_SEMESTER_I

        public static final double INSURENCE_FEE_SEMESTER_I
        Semester 1 : $456.48
        Student insurance for the first semester.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INSURENCE_FEE_SEMESTER_II

        public static final double INSURENCE_FEE_SEMESTER_II
        Semester 2 (including semester 3) : $760.2
        Student insurance for both second semester and third semester is $760.20. Use this value only while calculating the second-semester fee.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INSURENCE_FEE_SEMESTER_III

        public static final double INSURENCE_FEE_SEMESTER_III
        Semester 3 : $ 0.0
        Student insurance for semester 3 is already included in semester 2.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INSURENCE_FEE_SEMESTER_IV

        3.Semester 4 : $456.48

        International student service fee : $75
        International student service fee is the fee charged towards every semester for international students.
        See Also:

      • calcSemCost

        public double calcSemCost(int semester,
                          int prerequisites,
                          double gpa)
        Calculates and returns total cost for that semester.
        Parameters:
        semester - Semester of the course of a student.
        prerequisites - Number of prerequisites of a student.
        gpa - GPA of the student.
        Returns:
        Total cost for a semester.
        i.e = Total cost for each course*no of courses + INSURENCE_FEE_SEMESTER_I + INTL_STUDENT_SERVICE_FEE + ORIENTATION_FEE - scholarship for that semester

      • calcTotalCost

        public double calcTotalCost(int semester,
                            int prerequisites,
                            double gpa)
        Calculates and returns total cost till semester.
        Total Cost till semester=Sum of cost of semester till semester provided
        Ex: total cost till sem 2 =(sem 1 total cost)+(sem 2 total cost)
        Parameters:
        semester - Semester of the course of a student.
        prerequisites - Number of prerequisites of a student.
        gpa - GPA of the student.
        Returns:
        Total cost till semester.

      • exchUSDToINR

        public double exchUSDToINR(double costInDollars)
        Converts and returns amount in rupees for the argument passed in dollar.
        Amount in Rupee=Amount in Dollar*Conversion rate to dollars.
        Parameters:
        costInDollars - Amount in dollar
        Returns:
        Value converted to rupees

      • exchUSDToEuro

        public double exchUSDToEuro(double costInDollars)
        Converts and returns amount in euro for the argument passed in dollar.
        Amount in Euro=Amount in Dollar*Conversion rate to dollars
        Parameters:
        costInDollars - Amount in dollar
        Returns:
        Value converted to rupees

                         int prerequisites,
                         double gpa)
        Prints Receipt of a Student by calculating total scholarship earned and total fee need to be paid till semester.
        Parameters:
